transcript:
Aap jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, vah anya call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha karein ya kuch samay pashchat.
Hello.
Hello.
Hello. Haan mam. Mam good morning. Greenage Energy Solution mein baat ho rahi hai?
Haan. Good morning mam. Mam main Vidhi baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART team se, Bhanu ki manager. Kal aap se baat hui thi Bhanu ki.
Actually mam aapko kal ek concern aaya tha hamare paas, right, API ko lekar. Mam actually aapko number diya tha na.
Wo bas maybe number de diya tha. Us number pe aap baat kar lijiye. Actually main aapko bata deti hu aapne aapse matlab hamari team ki baat to hui thi aapke dusre number pe, right?
But aapke paas ek feedback mail aaya hoga isi number pe. Uspe aapne not satisfied mark kiya hai, isliye maine aapko connect kiya hai.
Mam actually na wo mail to isi number pe aaya hoga but jinse aapki baat hui thi na, unhe ek baar contact kar lijiye aap.
Okay. Wo number hai, unka number hai aapke paas?
Ah nahi aap ek baar bata do ki please.
Amit.

Ah mam 94111.
94111.
02602.
02602.
Haan. Thik hai mam. Thank you.
Welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received feedback mail on wrong number.



Resolution:

- Executive provided the correct contact number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, contact number, api
